review_text: IT'S NOT RESOLVED!! PLEASE OPTIMISE YOU APP. It Hogs all the RAM and freezes and Reloads by itself after a while and I lose my search progress !!! having to start all over again!!. I use flipkart most of the time,more than Amazon and Snapdeal. My device runs both like a breeze on tgise apps, but Flipkart times-out and freezes, and takes longer to Load...sometimes it gets so slow that I just log out midway. 8gb of RAM is more than enough for everything i do,but it can't handle Flipkart, what!!???

Very poor customer service. They impose all kinds of burden on customers only . They don't set the liability of sellers. I purchased two items and repeatedly the seller sent the wrong item. At last I didn't get anything but I paid a platform fee two times it happened. it doesn't matter how much I paid ?? but it's wrong in case you are not taking the responsibility then why are you serving as a mediator between customer and seller?? why don't you register the complaint against the seller??

I recently bought these glasses from Flipkart, and I am extremely happy with the quality. The frame feels strong and lightweight, making it very comfortable to wear for long hours. The lens clarity is excellent, and it gives a very stylish look too. Packaging was secure, delivery was fast, and the product looks exactly like the pictures. Overall, a great value for money. If you are thinking of buying good-quality glasses at a reasonable price, go for it without any doubt!

If it's possible to give a negative review, i would have given it as well. First of all, they don't allow you to talk to their customer service executive on call, no matter how much you are pissed off by the service, you just can't contact them. And the delivery issue, they never deliver you on the given date, expect an extra 4 to 5 days delay on every product you order.

I don‚Äôt understand what Flipkart is even doing anymore. I tried buying a 1TB WD hard drive for ‚Çπ4750, and the app straight-up refused to deliver it to my address. Not once. Not twice. Five different addresses I tried. Every single one showed ‚ÄúNo Delivery Available.‚Äù And the best part? I tried again after a few days hoping it was a glitch, and the same nonsense happened all over again. What kind of platform lists products they can‚Äôt even deliver? This is ridiculous and a complete waste of time.

Flipkart has given me a very bad experience again. I received a fraud product‚Äîwrong item, poor quality, and even the bill on the parcel was changed. When I requested a return/refund, your team kept telling me to wait for a week. It has now been almost a month, yet no pickup and no refund. This is unacceptable. Please stop selling such fraudulent products and resolve my issue immediately.

Very bad experience, their customer care executive doesn't help with anything and their application and process is horrible. I cancelled a replacement request and wanted to generate a return request instead of it and it took them 6 days to do so, this is heights when other applications do it immediately. Better order from other platforms who resolve your issues and queries quickly if you face them.

So I have been using flipkart for many years. And this year I have frustrated with the service of flipkart. All the product delivered are used or duplicate products and the delivery is also delayed. And when you return damaged, defective, wrong color product or any other issue, they will sometimes charge return fees and they will also not return platform fee. They are increasing platform fee on day to day basis. In the October month it was 2 Rs. and now they are charging 7 to 10 Rs. and more.

Flipkart used to deliver products within 7 days, but now the delivery takes much longer. The app shows 12‚Äì14 days, yet the order still gets delayed and often arrives after 18‚Äì20 days. This affects the whole shopping experience, especially when we order something for a specific occasion and it doesn‚Äôt arrive on time. Even the SuperCoins and offers feel less rewarding now. Please improve the delivery speed and accuracy

Four points 1. Pressing back button from item page takes user back to the top of the cart page instead of taking user to the last location in the SAVED FOR LATER list. 2. It takes a long to move item from one wishlist to another. End. 3. There is no wish list in grocery items. You can't save any item in a list for later purchase. 4. The "question & answers" feature is insane. Moderation is ridiculous. End.

I've had an extremely frustrating experience with deliveries. As a Flipkart Plus Premium user, I expected better service, but the delivery process has been terrible. Multiple orders were cancelled without explanation, and the delivery executives repeatedly attempt fake deliveries i.e giving missed calls and marking orders as undelivered. It‚Äôs absurd that I have to wait 15-20 days for items to arrive.

My experience with flipkart has been consistently disappointing. A frequent and significant issue is the arbitrary cancellation of orders, often accompanied by a generic message citing 'unforeseen reasons.' Furthermore, the vendor screening process appears inadequate. I have encountered multiple sellers who advertise discounts off an inflated MRP. For refunds, one literally has to beg before them to get the refund initiated.

Very bad grocery service. After adding any item to the cart they increase the price within few minutes. Those who are purchasing bulk items will never be able to understand when the price of the carry has been increased. It's a big scam. Amazon, big basket etc are kuch better. They don't do this kind of scams.

Very poor substandard service by Flipkart. Sells used and defective products and when one tries to return shows the product doesn't match quality standards. Another notification arrives that we will try to pickup the next day and that day it shows return request has been cancelled and doesn't allow return of that pathetic product. I think only consumer forums can help with these cheaters.

Never order from flipkart app. I trusted and ordered a product but got the different product from the item, when I replaced that item, the delivery boy said it will be not replaced and I have to message to the help section and the customer care, after I messaged they said it is not possible and the product will not be returned because the time is over, what will I do right now ???? it's totally scammed!!! Now I am fully frustrated, it has happened, I'm saying never trust Fully to the flipkart !

I‚Äôve been a loyal customer, but the service has degraded significantly. My last 3-4 prepaid orders faced constant delays and false 'delivery attempted' notifications, even though no agent called. Customer care is unreachable, and when connected, the responses are robotic. Extremely frustrated by the lack of resolution and accountability. ‚Äã

Adding a new delivery address in this shopping app is very inconvenient. The app now forces us to locate the address on the map, which becomes a problem when we‚Äôre ordering to a friend‚Äôs place in a different area. Even when we type the correct address in the map‚Äôs search box, it doesn‚Äôt show up. The previous method for adding addresses was much better and more user-friendly. Please bring that back.

it's Flipkart no more. this is more like cancelkart. no reasons given .they just cancel the order by saying that the seller doesn't want to deliver here. how about informing the customer at time of placing order. about a month ago I used to place order for fresh veges on the 9 minutes delivery which got delivered but for last few week their page is blank. I got in touch with the customer support and they promised that the issue would be solved but till today it's the same. pathetic .

I am very disappointed with Flipkart‚Äôs delivery service. Every time my order shows ‚ÄúOut for Delivery,‚Äù they cancel it with a ‚ÄúDelivery Failed‚Äù message without even trying to deliver it. It seems like the delivery person has no intention of actually delivering the package. This has happened multiple times, and it is extremely frustrating. Flipkart needs to fix their delivery system and make sure customers receive their or very bad service from Flipkart üò°üò°

Very poor customer support for flipkart 10 minutes. When I checked with the bank, the bank said there was no such refund transaction made and asked to check with the app itself. However, there is no way to raise this as a complaint in Flipkart 10 minutes AI bot customer support. AI bot support keeps on looping with the same questions.

there is a very useless feature added recently that autoplay ad videos in search result that we can't turn off. it consumes my 1.5 gb data in minutes. besides that I can't concentrate on product and can't scroll more time to decide product because of high data consumption in autoplay videos and because of that I can't decide the product and close the app without shopping. very bad experience about it. please fix it asap.

Ordered 3 products. All three arrived wrong. First product: return was not processed properly, even though customer service said it was done. Second product: return still not done despite repeated requests. Third product: had to take a refund because return process was unreliable. Very disappointed with service. Not trustworthy.

don't buy anything in expensive productsüò°üò°, because they give us duplicate product, and if you want to return that product they didn't taken that product. Grocery orders always have delivery fee, even you are Plus membership and order value above 2K Edit 1: Unable to cancel my order which is NOT delivered as per schedule. Customers should be able to cancel orders if they do not deliver as per schedule. some items list to foolish customer like they strike MRP price and the sell at same price. careful with item price Edit 2: Have platform fees as well. crazy people! do you have any other way to order? edit 1: app crashing when browsing for a while

4 points. 1. Search results keep refreshing automatically. 2. When you open an item from saved for later list the back button takes you to top of saved for later list instead of same location. 3. Managing wish list is very tedious. 4. Same item is expensive in my flipkart account but cheaper in another person's Flipkart account. End

Flipkart must refund whole amount to the customer once it's cancelled. I don't like flipkart's reviewing process either. Our reviews undergo a moderation process. they have became a thief company.. sending half empty products and not even coming for the return even in returnable products untill the return period gets over.. not receiving any satisfactory response from customer executive.. they all have a fixed cramming answers to all the complaints.. " THERE IS SOME TECHNICAL ISSUE" "WE CAN'T HELP YOU FROM HERE, YOU HAVE TO WRITE TO US" "WE WILL GET BACK TO YOU IN 2-3DAYS" then we don't get any response and even after multiple complaints, we get no resp

Nowadays service is too bad. I have ordered 10 days and paid the amount. It was still not delivered yet 3 days back is estimated delivery. Getting bad experience from few days, what appears in page does not match with the offer while going for payment. worst experience in online shopping ever. i would have given 0 if it could have possible but it's the of the worst shopping I have ever seen.. like how i have very old customer of flipkart but they are not really care about customer's issues .. i ordered and paid also but the delivery boy continuously Ignoring my calls and it's showing out of delivery since Morning I said already please delivery on time cz i need to attend .. the customer service also not answering.. and the automatic message support also not answering the queries ...

Flipkart used to be a reliable e-commerce platform, but now it has turned into one of the worst. Worst app, The staff of flipkart is full of defaulters. If you buy any item from this app, especially grocery, and if you do not receive it and you lodge a complaint, you do not get a refund. Ordered a Philips Air Fryer on 20th October, but it got delivered after a month on 25th November only after multiple follow-ups with customer care. To make things worse, the product arrived damaged. I requested a refund since replacement wasn‚Äôt available, and the pickup was promised by 29th November, but no one has come yet. Extremely poor service and disappointing experience from Flipkart.

I am extremely disappointed with my experience on Flipkart. I received the wrong product, and even after repeatedly requesting a return, no one came to pick it up. This is by far the worst app I‚Äôve ever used. The products only come with a return option and absolutely no refund policy. There is no proper tracking on the delivery dates every time it's been delayed for more than a week.. I think it's better to switch to Amazon as we get the products on time at the same price. Very worst experience with Flipkart

I am extremely disappointed with Flipkart's repeated delivery failures. I waited 15 days for a mobile cover that was initially expected in 5 days and was even marked as "Out for Delivery". After two weeks of waiting, the order was suddenly and unilaterally cancelled. This is the second time this has happened, demonstrating severe issues with your logistics. worst app among all online shopping app and even worst customer care support, first they are difficult to reach and if you reach once it's useless because they will only say I can understand ma'am and they will not give you you any solution. i ordered a product and I wanted to exchange it with bigger size but I didn't get any option only return was available with deducted money of rs 7 and product was also in stock but then also I cannot exchange it and product also has exchange policy of 7 days

I am very disappointed with Flipkart‚Äôs service. My order has been delayed for more than 10 days, and there is no proper update from the delivery team. Customer support is also not helpful and keeps giving the same repeated responses. Flipkart really needs to improve its delivery system and provide accurate updates.

I will not use Flipkart in the future. I ordered a mobile cover, and a platform fee of ‚Çπ7 was added. I cancelled it immediately because the address was mismatched. I received a refund only for the product price, but the platform fee was not refunded. I lost seven rupees in just one minute.

Such a pathetic experience! I have been ordering from here since 2019, but this time has been extremely disappointing. Now they are saying it will be delivered within the next 24 hours. This was urgent for me as I am travelling tomorrow, yet they are not even allowing me to cancel it, calling it ineligible.

Never use the flipkart minutes. I have ordered rice and they have sent me some low quality rice. When I wanted to return the product in its original packing. Worst delivery experience ever. My Flipkart order was supposed to arrive on 20th, but it kept getting delayed day after day with no clear reason. After the recent update, the app experience has significantly declined. I can no longer see all the offers available for products, and I‚Äôm unable to select from saved addresses. Additionally, the reviews are not displaying properly, leading to a very frustrating and confusing user interface. Overall, the update has made the app much harder to use.

I have been experiencing extremely poor delivery service on every order. Delivery personnel consistently do not deliver to the specified delivery address.
